nodes.bodyText: @Parameter(hidden = true) should be all you need.
Yeah, it is the only necessary part but I added the other items because I wanted it to match many of the newer endpoints for consistency.
name is fine but unnecessary, but in = ParameterIn.HEADER is just wrong.  You can always change the other ones.
Maybe elaborate, there is probably something going on with ParameterIn.DEFAULT that you're referring to.
Was still curious about the explanation here. Also does the swagger-ui "try it now" operation work with in = ParameterIn.HEADER missing? Please confirm, thanks!
Yeah, tried a few random endpoints and the try it now is still working
